headline: The Bull Case For Globe Life (GL) Could Change Following Raised 2026 Guidance And Margin Gains - Learn Why
summary: In early February 2026, Globe Life Inc. reported higher fourth-quarter and full-year 2025 revenue and net income, alongside a raised 2026 net operating income guidance range of US$14.95 to US$15.65 per diluted share. The company paired these results with continued share repurchases and ongoing technology investments aimed at improving agent productivity, lead generation, and underwriting margins across its life and health insurance lines. We’ll now examine how the upgraded 2026 earnings...
